data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Al Jawf, Saudi Arabia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Jawf, Saudi Arabia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 369,300 people living in Al Jawf through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 188 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Al Jawf to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Al Jawf, Saudi Arabia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Shahari, Jibbali people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, please give every church in the state of Al Jawf a passion to plant another simple church.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Al Jawf, Saudi Arabia, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Al Jawf, Saudi Arabia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

location.name: Al Jawf
location.people_groups_list: Malay, Arab, Omani, Persian, Javanese, Kabardian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Malay (17,000), Arab, Omani (136,000), Persian (240,000), Javanese (31,000), Kabardian (27,000)
